name: Haunt of Vaxo
flavorText: "The great sorcerer Vaxo of Kehjan did not actually die in the Mage Clan Wars. In reality, he was imprisoned where all mages with shattered minds are, the Bitter Depths beneath Caldeum's Yshari Sanctum. Vaxo's famous amulet is said to have been smuggled out of there, but that is patently impossible. Once inside, no one ever leaves the Bitter Depths." —Abd al-Hazir
